name: DiDi
description: For investment banks, private equity firms, and consulting firms that spend extensive time and resources on financial analysis and due diligence, DiDi offers an AI-powered software that automates processes and material creation. Delivering accurate and comprehensive research, memos, financial models, presentations, and reports in a fraction of the time.
one_liner: For investment banks, private equity firms, and consulting firms that spend extensive time and resources on financial analysis and due diligence, DiDi offers an AI-powered software that automates processes and material creation. Delivering accurate and comprehensive research, memos, financial models, presentations, and reports in a fraction of the time.
